Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh struck twice in the 2nd over to get De Kock and Rossouw out
Lungi Ngidi picked up four wickets to restrict India to a low total
David Miller and Aiden Markram scored fifties to lead South Africa to a five-wicket win
Post-Match Reflections: Temba Bavuma said that South Africa doesn't like being tagged as favorites and will continue to improve
Rohit Sharma said that India was poor in the field and gave away too many chances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Perth Stadium in Australia
South Africa's pace attack was led by Lungi Ngidi, Anrich Nortje, and Kagiso Rabada
India's batting lineup struggled against the pace attack, with many batsmen getting out to short balls
